verses.text: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; early will I \w seek|strong="H7836"\w* thee: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w thirsteth|strong="H6770"\w* for thee, my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w longeth|strong="H3642"\w* for thee in a \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* and \w thirsty|strong="H5889"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, where \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* is;\f + \fr 63.1 \ft thirsty: Heb. weary\f*\f + \fr 63.1 \ft where…: without water\f*
To \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w power|strong="H5797"\w* and thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, so \add as\add* I have \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* thee in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.
Because thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H7623"\w* thee.
Thus will I \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee while I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*: I will lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* as \add with\add* \w marrow|strong="H2459"\w* and \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*; and my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add thee\add* with \w joyful|strong="H7445"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*:\f + \fr 63.5 \ft marrow: Heb. fatness\f*
When I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee upon my \w bed|strong="H3326"\w*, \add and\add* \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* on thee in the \add night\add* \w watches|strong="H0821"\w*.
Because thou hast been my \w help|strong="H5833"\w*, therefore in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of thy \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* will I \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*.
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* followeth \w hard|strong="H1692"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee: thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w upholdeth|strong="H8551"\w* me.

But those \add that\add* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H7722"\w* \add it\add*, shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the lower \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They shall \w fall|strong="H5064"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H3027"\w*: they shall be a \w portion|strong="H4521"\w* for \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w*.\f + \fr 63.10 \ft They shall fall…: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of\f*

But the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; every one that \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* by him shall \w glory|strong="H1984"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of them that \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* shall be \w stopped|strong="H5534"\w*.
